Title: A letter to the people of Chaoyang District
Designer: Beijing Municipal Chaoyang District Committee for the Construction of Spiritual Civilization (北京市朝阳区精神文明建设委员会)
Notes: An open letter to the inhabitants of Beijing's Chaoyang District from the Beijing Municipal Chaoyang District Committee for the Construction of Spiritual Civilization, thanking them for their contributions to the successes of the 2008 Beijing Olympics. It lists the achievements of the various administrative bodies responsible for the success, as well as the benefits that the citizens enjoyed as a result of the massive investments.
